item.title: Blog: HEIR meeting 2024-07-18 (mod_arith dialect)
item.description: Here are the notes and video recording from the HEIR meeting on 2024-07-18. This special discussion was focused on the modular arithmetic dialect.

item.title: Blog: HEIR meeting 2024-04-04
item.description: Here are the notes and video recording from the HEIR meeting on 2024-04-04.

item.title: Blog: HEIR meeting 2023-12-12
item.description:
Here are the notes and video recording from the HEIR meeting on 2023-12-12.

This is the last meeting for 2023. Please respond to this poll for 2024 scheduling preferences.

item.title: Blog: HEIR meeting 2023-09-26
item.description:
Here are the notes and video recording from the HEIR meeting on 2023-09-26.

Next meeting (Oct 10) is canceled for the MLIR workshop, and I’ll post an update from that workshop on this blog, hopefully also with a video of the talk that Alex Viand and I will be giving at the LLVM developers meeting.

item.title: Blog: HEIR meeting 2023-07-18
item.description:
The third HEIR meeting was 2023-07-18 (notes).

We decided to schedule future meetings every two weeks, with alternating focus on MLIR and Hardware. See the meeting calendar to join. (direct link to the calendar)
